progetto.network

Class ClientConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • progetto.network.ClientConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public final class ClientConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Client connection is the object encapsulating the the INetworkClient implementations that provide to the client all the method needed to communicate with the server. All request sending methods are synchronized, so requests can be performed from any thread.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClientConnection(INetworkClient h, ISync ogg)
      creates a client connection.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientConnection

        public ClientConnection(INetworkClient h,
                        ISync ogg)
        creates a client connection. This will start the thread that processes the pending enforces sent by the server
        Parameters:
        h - the INetworkClient implementation that must be used to exchange message with the server.
        ogg - the synchronization object that will be used in this session. The object will be cleared.

        public final void createGame(java.lang.String roomName)
        tries to create a room on the server
        Parameters:

      • getSyncronizationFailedCallback

        public final Callback<ClientConnection> getSyncronizationFailedCallback()
        callback called every time a discrepancy in synchronization is noted
        Returns:
        the instance of socket client that failed the synchronization

      • fetchServerState

        public void fetchServerState()
        ask the server for the current state of the server

      • getPlayerID

        public int getPlayerID()
        Returns:
        the id of the player. Player id cannot change at run time, but can be equal to -1 if the server did not yet sent the value that will be used this model

      • joinGame

        public final void joinGame(int roomID,
                           java.lang.String playerName)
        Tries to join a model
        Parameters:
        roomID - roomID you are trying to join
        playerName - the name with which you will be called.

        tries to select a chair for this player
        Parameters:
        chairID - the number of the chair you are trying to pick

      • sendPrivateMessage

        public final void sendPrivateMessage(java.lang.String message,
                                     int targetID)
        tries to send a message to a particular player
        Parameters:
        message - message you are trying to send
        targetID - target you are trying to reach.

      • getPlayerName

        public final java.lang.String getPlayerName()
        Returns:
        the name of the current player.

      • getMessageCallback

        public Callback<java.lang.String> getMessageCallback()
        Returns:
        the callback that is called when a message is received by the network. Notice that messages are not processed from the enforce processing thread, therefore if can be triggered at any time.

      • getChair

        public int getChair()
        Returns:
        the chair currently used by this chair, -1 if he is not in a room

      • isReady

        public boolean isReady()
        Returns:
        the ready status of this player, false if he is not in a room

      • setReady

        public final void setReady(boolean ready)
        tries to set this player ready
        Parameters:
        ready - new state of the ready value

      • sendSynString

        public void sendSynString(java.io.Serializable s)
        send a sync string
        Parameters:
        s - the sync string to be sent

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        shuts down the connection, tries to disconnect gracefully.

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Returns:
        true if the underlying implementation is still running

      • run

        public void run()
        while the underlying implementation is still running it keeps processing all the received enforces.
